post.body: still makes me laugh even now! Lol.
Cheers Craig! I hope it does too.
sorry browner. He meant "the new team".
interesting read!
if you had of swapped them years ago this would never of happened.
you can fix it! Hold the mouse upside down and rub the roller ball really hard with your hand, or rub it hard on a cloth same way.
that' one of my favorite heads.
hold it upside down and rub the ball REALLY HARD with your hand. Or turn it upside down and rub it on a piece of cloth.
I lied! I couldn't resist! I must resist emails.
what did I tell ya.
interesting results, hmmmm.
what, your not invited? That's not nice man, yer a part of the team :0(
it's Fontbook Jason, everyone knows that.
did you give up one of your nice big monitors for your new team member?
don't think so?
lol, takes a while to see it then when you do you can't miss it.
welcome!
good work!
twittering whilst driving is really not a good idea.
somehow I think Laura will be feeling the same (probably worse) ;0)
I may need them after sampling Laura's cooking tonight. Wish me luck!
erm, don't think they will fit her... Thanks for the offer though!
lol, I can sympathise with you.
things never really finish when you run your own business.
wonders if Rob Walker is still alive?
Just sent some awesome logo concepts off to a client. Hope he likes em!
Loving the way you can bring transparent PSD's into Illustrator! The possibilities are endless.
After a bad start (meaning that Ben decided to drop his keys down a 20 foot drain) the meeting went well. Now back to work.
Facing the M3 this morning to attend a meeting about interesting business proposition.
First day at FHOKE over. Bring on the rest!
Where does the day go!
There is no better feeling that having satisfied customers. Get in!
It's my first day full time on FHOKE, sensing good times ahead. Let's to this Ben! :0)
Working with Ben on a brand and website for a major player in the world of online gaming. Get in!
is liking Twitterfox http://twitterfox.en.softonic.com/
is excited about the future! check out http://www.fhoke.com/
Still has no followers. Maybe I need to find some interesting things to say.
Is Linkedin! http://www.linkedin.com/in/brettatfhoke
Love this site: http://tinyurl.com/44uzgp
Is wondering what this week will bring?
Had a lovely weekend with Claire, great to have her back!
Clients should realise that their brand guidelines are only a guide.
Back from a great client meeting, minor amends to be done then ready for build.
Why do some clients tell you they will call then not bother?
Just had a massive plate of leftover Chinese takeaway, Yum!
Man I love illustration! Doing some nice work for an online gambling portal.
Heard a brilliant story from Ben tonight! Now can't shop chuckling to myself :0)
Mac Mice really are rubbish, thanks to Jason I now have the answer to everyone's scrolling problems.
Is thinking that the best way to deal with creative blocks is not to think at all. Just do what comes naturally.
Right, get this site over to the client and on with the rest of the day.
Right. Emails sorted, now off for some breaky.
Loving Twitter! Meeting interesting people and getting industry updates, should of used it sooner.
I think you always need an hourly rate as a starting point then from that work out a total project price. Each to their own.
Maybe the strange thing is that we are both really enjoying it!
Is it strange that Ben and I are sat hear listening to the new Take That album?
Looking forward to setting up the office with Ben. Bring on 2009!
Back from London, great client meeting. Things are now moving forward!
Preparing for client meeting in the Big Smoke. Man I hate London and Trains.
Working with an awkward brand? http://www.fhoke.com/blog.php?blog_id=47
Having happy clients is a great feeling!
Completed a long lingering project and half way through writing a blog post about working with brands. A productive afternoon me thinks.
Really impressed with BBC's iPlayer
Drinking a Chocolate Fudge Brownie Frijj, Yum!
After a productive week I am looking forward to another one :o)
Ahh, still makes me smile: http://www.fhoke.com/blog.php?blog_id=45
Still like these logos http://www.fhoke.com/blog.php?blog_id=46
preparing for another meeting with a potential new client.
Just watched Hancock, brilliant film! Really should leave my computer alone on the weekend.
Off to relax, starting the wind down for Christmas.
website design inspiration http://w3csites.com/
Back from festive pub lunch with Pure Innovation and the guys at Xcite Digital.
Testing Ping.fm
Survived Laura's spinach Pancakes, actually they were really nice. Wish I could see her face this morning, she should be feeling V V rough.
join us on Linkedin http://www.fhoke.com/blog.php?blog_id=50
Twitter really is like Messenger.
Any tips on potty training puppies? This is getting ridiculous.
I am constantly amazed by the lack of talent that some web agencies have, how do they keep going?
It's great having a puppy, she is lovely but when I find a shit load of shit under the bed it really is not fun.
Eating chocolate HobNobs... Yum!
